title: klien_br
author: klien_br
content: As the title states. I am looking for someone familiar with solidity and react to develop a smart contract and front-end for a simple project.Have a low budget and would only proceed through an escrow.Find below reference platform. Need similar platform with few minor changes.Reference platform : https://bsgfod.com/Please quote your pricing for the same.

comments.author: TimtheYoutuber
comments.body: I sent you a PM so we can talk more. I can help with this, https://forrestvisions.com/defi.html

comments.body: I think I can help you, please reach me here: http://exio.tech/contact-us/
